meta.title: Home - Manchester Township School District

meta.name: description
meta.content: A public school district in Manchester Township, Ocean County, NJ .

meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Manchester Township School District, Manchester NJ, Public School District
A public school district in Manchester Township, Ocean County, NJ .

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-967 fsTag-6 fsTag-298 fsTag-346 fsTag-427

div.a: Free Webinars for Parents from FEA/PTA

img.alt: FEA and PTA bring you a webinar series for parents

div.p: This webinar series is designed specifically for families to explore strategies, resources, and supports to strengthen families as they navigate life today.

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-967 fsTag-6 fsTag-298 fsTag-346 fsTag-427

div.p: Please Mr. Trethaway's update letter which includes important information, including changes in marking period and report card dates.

Welcome to our website! Our goal is to keep you informed about school activities and provide resources for students, parents and staff. You will find quick links to our most important resource pages on the blue navigation bar at the top of our site. The circle icons above will open our News, Twitter and Facebook feeds. Please sign up to receive updates and alerts.

section.class: fsElement fsPostElement fsGrid subtext fsThumbnailOriginal fsThumbnailXLarge fsItemCount_6

p.br: Remote learning will pause during Spring Break and resume on Monday, April 20.

img.alt: MTHS Student Scheduling April 1-9 - see guidance website
Apply anytime for free and reduced lunch

article.class: fsStyleAutoclear fsBoard-841 fsTag-296 fsTag-299 fsTag-300 fsTag-301

img.alt: Schools Closed - resources on our Parent Page

div.p: Please see our PARENTS PAGE for at-home instruction resources.

p.br: This folder contains resources for parents and staff.

div.p: Open the newsletter for links to tools and resources for remote learning.

a.title: Powered by Finalsite opens in a new window

span.strong: PLEASE NOTE: The end of third marking period has been changed to April 24, with report cards issued on April 30.

div.p: Updates and Procedure Changes Beginning March 23 (3-22-20)
What to do if Your Child is Sick & Cannot Complete the Work (3-17-20)
Important Information About Remote Learning Days (3-17-20)
Remote Learning Newsletter - contains resource links for all grade levels
PARENT PAGE - find all of our remote learning resources for parents here, including frequently asked questions
